attributes.action: Force comercial vehicles to reduce their c02 emissions with tax like every one else.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Lorries and busses belch fumes out far more than the average car, when was the last time you sat in traffic with the bus in front of you spewing great clouds of smoke into the air when it pulled off, yet they are exempt from the environmental tax that all other vehicles are subjected to, this is one Not fair Two a missed opportunity for the government to seriously cut down c02 emissions from road transport. Please sign this petition and tell the government it is time to change this double standard and discrimination in favour of the commercial vehicle and make a real difference to c02 emissions.
